entry.title: DOUBLESPEAK & SUBTERFUGE
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,946Chapters: 5/18Kudos: 20

Summary: After a series of events are erased from public memory, Stiles returns to Beacon Hills Prep with a fractured reputation and a growing power. Meanwhile Scott is having trouble reconciling the pressure and expectations from his estranged fathers–Rafael–sudden return.As the school restructures and supernatural tensions rise, old alliances are tested, new leaders emerge, and hidden agendas begin to surface. With friendships strained and the political balance shifting, Stiles and Scott are drawn deeper into a world of rituals, legacy, and dangerous expectations. Stiles also begins training under a reluctant mentor when he uncovers truths about the past and his role in a future that others are quietly trying to shape.Meanwhile, forces inside and outside the school maneuver to gain control, and the line between protector and pawn begins to blur. When violence erupts and loyalties are tested, Stiles must decide who he is, who he stands with, and what he’s willing to become to survive what’s coming next.Some power is inherited. Some is stolen. But the most dangerous kind? The uncontrollable.

entry.title: ANMTM
entry.summary:
Author: Bouncy_cat

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,046Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 159

Summary: When Derek returns to Beacon Hills after college he gets a job at the library.It's supposed to be temporary, just until he finds something better, more challenging. But days turn into weeks, and weeks turn into months. He has his routine and his small apartment and his family. He's doing okay.His sisters don't agree and decide to spice up his life a little...by making him audition for America's Next Male Top Model.A.k.a the America's next top model AU nobody has been waiting for, with Stiles Stilinski as one of the judges.Warning: will be dealing with past domestic violence.

entry.title: I Left In the Silence You Made
entry.summary:
Author: Dance_InThe_Dark

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 210Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 9

Summary: Stiles Stilinski thought he understood heartbreak.He thought he'd felt it in the quiet moments—when his mother died, when his father broke under the weight of grief, when his best friend drifted away into something unrecognizable.He thought heartbreak was familiar.But nothing—absolutely nothing—could have prepared him for this.Not for the way his heart caved in on itself.Not for the way his breath caught like glass in his throat.Not for the way the world stopped spinning the moment he heard those words spill from the lips of the man he secretly loved more than anyone ever should:"Leave, Stiles." Or How Stiles Stilinski gets pushed out of the pack and moves to Los Angeles to live with his long-lost uncle John Nolan, the oldest rookie in the LAPD.

entry.title: So Wrong It's Right
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,806Chapters: 3/8Kudos: 9

Summary: Derek had worked hard to get where he was. A mid-level manager in a respectable company, known far and wide for his efficiency. Smart. Intelligent. Educated. Accomplished. Modesty wasn’t his strong suit, but hey, who cared.He had it all figured out: emails, spreadsheets, meetings. In short, he was the guy who got shit done, and did it without breaking a sweat—a man who could handle everything.Everything except, well… Stiles.Stiles fucking Stilinski, the new hire.

entry.title: Copain of the black wolf.
entry.summary:
Author: EverythingRara

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 112,711Chapters: 12/40Kudos: 72

Summary: A Sterek rewrite of the show, shown through the eyes of Stiles Stilinski, unknown soul mate of Derek Hale.Starts slow emotionally, my first attempt at a story of this degree please be gentle.Stiles grunted softly as he heaved himself onto the roof, his sneakers scuffing against the shingles. Scott—his best friend since forever—wasn’t answering his phone, and Stiles couldn’t wait. There was no way Scott was going to believe what Stiles had just overheard.Keeping low, Stiles crept along the roof toward Scott’s window, his heart racing as the cool night air pressed against his skin. He tried the window, but it wouldn’t budge—it was locked.“Of course it’s locked,” he muttered under his breath, rolling his eyes.Knocking softly on the glass, he leaned in closer, squinting to peer inside. The curtains were drawn, giving him only a hazy, distorted view of the room beyond. “Scott,” he hissed, rapping on the window again. No answer.Suddenly, the curtains shifted, and the window flung open. Scott and Stiles screamed, startling each other.

entry.title: No Graves for the Forgotten
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 71,516Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 54

Summary: He’s the face behind the throne.The ghost of a golden palace.The man married to the monster who destroyed everything.Stiles Stilinski has learned how to disappear in plain sight — with soft lips, dangerous eyes, and a body trained to please, not to feel.Derek Hale should hate him.But everything about Stiles is a provocation: the low voice, the crooked smile, the whispered secrets in the shadows of rebellion.They meet by accident.Then, by necessity.Soon, by desire.But Stiles carries secrets that could bring empires down — and an emptiness only Derek seems to see.In a world where love is a weapon and loyalty is a convenient lie, some sparks don’t fade.They burn everything in their path.

entry.summary:
Author: Hathly

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,363Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 134

Summary: Stiles didn’t expect to see Derek Hale at college. Not after years of teenage antagonism, not after that one summer where Derek glared at him for breathing too loud. But suddenly Derek is here—older, hotter, and somehow the only person who knows Stiles’ schedule better than his own.Now they’re kind-of-maybe friends. entry.title: call it off
entry.summary:
Author: endversed

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,491Chapters: 5/11Kudos: 450

Summary: “You kissed me,” Stiles says. To that, Derek says nothing. His gaze does not leave Stiles’ mouth. “But you… you’re straight,” Stiles carries on. And still, Derek says nothing. His fingers twitch harshly around his grip on thin air. “You have a girlfriend,” Stiles whispers. Derek is on his feet in an instant.  Stiles is the gay, terminally-single loser of Beacon Hills High. Derek is the straight, cheerleader-dating jock he should have been smart enough to stay away from.

entry.title: with lightning in his hands
entry.summary:
Author: whimsicalmeerkat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,451Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 561

Summary: Stiles stares at the ruins of the Hale house and reflects that perhaps he should have taken Deaton more seriously when he told him starting to practice magic would change how he saw the world.~On the tenth anniversary of the Hale fire, Stiles makes his way out to the ruins to read. It turns out, ruins isn’t exactly the right word anymore.

Summary: After a breakup, Stiles moves to Lyon, looking for a fresh start. He finds a small apartment on a narrow street where buildings stand almost within arm’s reach. There, he starts to notice his neighbour from across the street.
